channel.title: Theme
channel.description:
What theme do you guy's use and why do you think it's better? I personally think that there is no difference, but why use one. Im currently been switching on and off between the default one etc. Btw, when im on my IPhone, I hate that mobile theme, all it does it keeps switching to mobile theme when i say GO to classic :s you should improve that so if you click classic theme, you will stay with that :P
Well yea tell me how you feel between the 2 theme's. Tell me why it's better?
